ActorTalk: The coordinates point right here...
These are all recently expanded shops. Maybe the terminal's been blocked by one of them?
Welcome to Cedar Shop! What can I get for you? Right now, we've got a great deal: buy anything, and get the same amount free!
Oh! It's [PlayerName]! What can I get for you? Right now, we've got a great deal: buy anything, and get the same amount free!
Tch. You sure talk a lot. Sounds like that speech module of yours needs to be sent back for repairs.
Y-you're Vera...
Out of the way. We need to inspect the shop. Won't take long.
Y-yes! Please come in!
You've got some nerve, locking public equipment inside your shop. What's next? People have to buy something just to use the terminal?
M-maybe the expansion was done in a hurry... We honestly didn't notice the terminal was there.
Tear this place down. Now.
But... our lease says we have the right to renovate the entire site. We didn't notice the terminal, but the space should still belong to us.
We've just stocked up on fresh goods. This cold storage room is really important for our business.
Until we have a permanent solution, Cedar Shop can keep its current layout. But if anyone's looking for the terminal, you'll need to point them to it.
If your lease checks out, I'll do my best to make sure you can keep the cold storage.
Thank you so much, [PlayerName]!
If possible, I'd like Cedar Shop to join the owners' committee. It'll help you collaborate and share resources with the other businesses.
No problem at all! As long as we can keep the cold storage, Cedar Shop will follow whatever you say!
This area... is bigger than I expected.
Well, it's better than nothing. What do we do nowâ€”search shops one by one?
Not long ago, I caught someone linked to the Flourish Guild. We could try questioning her.
Sounds good. Let's go talk to her.
A public terminal...? I've never seen one. Why not buy something instead? Right now, we've got a great deal: buy anything, and get the same amount free!
Take a look at our products first. You'll definitely want to buy something, and we've got a great deal going on: buy anything, and get the same amount free!
Hi. We need to inspect the inside of your store.
Your storefront might be blocking a public terminal.
I'm not here to shop.
Let's check the terminal.
Don't worry. I'll take care of this properly.
